mapper.select: SELECT A.i_review, A.i_board, A.i_user, A.ctnt, A.rating, B.nick FROM t_review A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user WHERE A.i_board = #{i_board} ORDER BY A.r_dt DESC LIMIT 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_review (i_board, i_user, ctnt, rating) VALUES (#{i_board}, #{i_user}, #{ctnt}, #{rating})
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_user A LEFT JOIN t_board B ON A.i_user = B.i_user LEFT JOIN t_review C ON A.i_user = C.i_user SET grade = (SELECT sum(rating) FROM t_review A LEFT JOIN t_board B ON A.i_board = B.i_board LEFT JOIN t_user C ON A.i_user = C.i_user WHERE B.i_user = 3) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_review A LEFT JOIN t_board B ON A.i_board = B.i_board LEFT JOIN t_user C ON A.i_user = C.i_user WHERE B.i_user = 3)
WHERE A.i_user = (SELECT i_user FROM t_board WHERE i_board = #{i_board})
